評価.学位授与の方針との関連Relationship to Diploma Polic:
1.This course is related to the Diploma Policy that students have basic knowledge about economic situations, history, languages, cultures, and religions of Japan and other countries, as students are expected to learn about social, cultural, and historical topics through various activities.
2.This course is also related to the Diploma Policy that students have appropriate communication skills through acquiring Japanese and more than one foreign language.
